title: Science Abstract Phenomena Understanding Project Utilizing Augmented Reality and Physical Manipulation

context.additional_context: Classroom environment equipped with digital devices (tablets, AR markers), with dedicated small-group activity spaces

learning_goals: Explain light refraction and interference phenomena with over 80% accuracy using AR and physical manipulation interfaces
